title: Help on ID for pub font.
content:
Hi guys,

I recently spotted these lovely fonts in a Pub and cant find out what the fonts are. Maybe they are just a certain calligraphy hand rendered font? If you look there should be at least 2 fonts.

Any help is great,

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423185603im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontpic_6100.jpg)
author: logybear

comments.content: [Casey](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423185603/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/casey/) is in the spirit of the script, as is [Metroscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423185603/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000286) (in a less buxom way).

assuming you'd like to view similar fonts ... (these aren't matches)

you might check out Letterhead fonts.

[Tideway](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423185603/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/tidewayscript.shtml)

[Chicago Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423185603/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/chicagoscript.shtml)

+ some others

or the Art and Sign Studio.

[Mother Lode](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423185603/http:/www.artandsignstudio.com/motherlode.html)

[Rister](http://web.archive.org/web/20120423185603/http:/www.artandsignstudio.com/Rister.html)

Ahh cool. Thanks for the help out and for the links guys. Very helpful

cheers
